result.execSummary:
The defendant Jennifer D Boatwright was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Conditions:

Attend, pay for, and successfully complete any programming ordered by the agent.

6 days credit in the event of revocation.

Court has imposed one set of costs.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

supervisions.notes: With 73 days credit, this is a time-served sentence. Costs from the original JOC have been converted to civil judgment, owed by the Defendant to the Clerk of Court.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Jennifer D Boatwright
Current: 536 S Park St Apt 2, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 08-08-2017)
Prior: 26700 Fellowship Ln, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States

Notice of Certification & Notice of Certification and Intent to Send the Amount Due to the Wisconsin Department of Revenue - Attempted Not Known, Unable to Forward, "Return to Sender, No one here by this name" - Different address listed on another case, Attempting to resend
State

Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright in court, in custody, with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. State and Defense recommend same as agent - 60 days on each count, concurrent with one another. Court orders 60 days jail, concurrent, with 73 days credit = time served. Costs reduced to civil judgment.
Sentencing hearing on revocation on May 19, 2017 at 02:00 pm.

15CT56, 16CM16, and 15CM229 called together; originally set for status. Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Counsel advise the Court that the parties have an agreement for resolution of all three matters, calling for def's plea to OWI 2nd in the CT case and to 2 counts of bail jumping in 16CM16 for dismissal of 15CM229.

Def pleads guilty to count 2/OWI 2nd in 15CT56 and to counts 1 and 2/bail jumping in 16CM16.  Court's colloquy on pleas.

15CT56 - sentence imposed 40 days - imposed in county jail but stayed for probation of 2 years.  Conditions of probation:  serve 5 days in jail; pay $1807 ($650 base), 18 mo revocation, 18 mo IID upon relicensing; AODA/driver safety plan to be relicensed.  $69 blood draw costs - RCPD.

16CM16 - counts 1 and 2/bail jumping - sentence withheld for probation 2 years w/1 set of costs.  Attend, pay for, and succ. complete any programming ordered by agent.  6 days credit in the event of revocation.
Status conference at 03-02-2016 10:00 am
Status conference at 02-29-2016 10:00 am

10:27 a.m.  Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright for status in 15CM229, 15CT56, and 16CM16.  Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright not in court.  Court notes correspondence received by COC office that def was out of town and not able to be at court this morning.  Atty. M says she's talked with client and explains to the Court why def is not here today; asks for setover to Monday, 2/29.  Court sets 2/29 at 10 for status in these matters.  Status conference scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 10:00 am.
State
Status conference at 02-24-2016 11:00 am

Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Status in 16CM16, 15CM229, and 15CT56.  DA asks for reset.  Atty. M states the parties are working towards resolution but are not yet ready to proceed.  Status conference scheduled for February 24, 2016 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jennifer D Boatwright
Current: 26700 Fellowship Ln, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 02-03-2016)
Prior: 219 N. Wisconsin Avenue, Muscoda, WI 53573

Cash bond amended to signature bond with the following conditions (same as the original bond):  Defendant is not to possess or consume alcohol.  Must submit to testing of blood, breath or urine on demand by law enforcement to monitor compliance.  No bars/taverns or any establishment with primary purpose of sale of alcohol.  (amended bond drafted at Court's direction per email correspondence to the Clerk)
Status conference at 02-10-2016 01:30 pm

Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court with Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright.  Court states charge and informs def of the possible max. penalties.  Atty M. waives formal hearing.  NG plea is entered.  Status conference scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance at 02-01-2016 01:30 pm

Defendant Jennifer D Boatwright in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Atty. M requests adjournment of the initial.  Court adjourns to Monday, Feb. 1 at 1:30.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
